description: Creates a static route associated with a VPN connection between an existing virtual private gateway and a VPN customer gateway. The static route allows traffic to be routed from the virtual private gateway to the VPN customer gateway. For more information, see Amazon Web Services Site-to-Site VPN in the Amazon Web Services Site-to-Site VPN User Guide.

parameters.name: DestinationCidrBlock
parameters.description: The CIDR block associated with the local subnet of the customer network.

parameters.name: VpnConnectionId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPN connection.
